mapper.insert: insert into party (leader_id, category_no, party_name, party_quota, party_description, party_filename) values (#{leader.id}, #{category.no}, #{name}, #{quota}, #{description}, #{filename})
mapper.select: select party_no as no, leader_id as "leader.id", category_no as "category.no", party_name as name, party_cur_cnt as curCnt, party_quota as quota, party_status as status, updated_at as updateAt, created_at as createAt, party_description as description, party_filename as filename from party where party_no = #{value}
